summary: I know what you mean, I'm so so attached to all of the characters and I love the way their relationships have developed - and...
question: I know what you mean, I'm so so attached to all of the characters and I love the way their relationships have developed - and Nott is just so  special. We just lost Molly in the last episode which is really hard, but I've already heard great things about Taliesin's new character! Do you ship Fjord and Caleb, or are you just invested in their friendship/individual journeys? (Full disclosure I ship every single iteration of all of them so very much)
answer:
that’s probably the hardest part of the campaign so far to get through, and still one of the only things i really wish hadn’t happened. i like Caduceus well enough but he’s not Molly, and despite the number episodes he’s been in so far i’ve noticed he hasn’t actually bonded with anybody yet, which is starting to throw me a little. Travis actually accidentally called Tal “Molly” this latest episode or so and i just, clutchheart.

i did ship Fjord and Caleb before but i think that was prior to knowing that Travis put his foot down on never doing romances in game ever, so that kinda quashed that for me. i’m excited to see if Laura can best him on that front though, since she’s declared she will. Jester & Fjord are adorable too. i would really love more Fjord and Caleb in general though, their dynamic is so great as the two with the high charisma and anytime i get Liam and Travis together it’s always an amazing scene.

Beau is an absolute fave of mine too, and her relationships with both of those two makes me stupid kinds of happy as well. i really want more Fjord & Nott scenes too - i want him to stop treating her like a pet rat or a brat kid along for the journey and actually realise she’s a whole person, and an adult. i think Sam and Travis could do amazing things with a scene like that.

reblog.comment:

i did ship Fjord and Caleb before but i think that was prior to knowing that Travis put his foot down on never doing romances in game ever, so that kinda quashed that for me. i’m excited to see if Laura can best him on that front though, since she’s declared she will. Jester & Fjord are adorable too. i would really love more Fjord and Caleb in general though, their dynamic is so great as the two with the high charisma and anytime i get Liam and Travis together it’s always an amazing scene.

Beau is an absolute fave of mine too, and her relationships with both of those two makes me stupid kinds of happy as well. i really want more Fjord & Nott scenes too - i want him to stop treating her like a pet rat or a brat kid along for the journey and actually realise she’s a whole person, and an adult. i think Sam and Travis could do amazing things with a scene like that.
